were doing it every day we do it retrospective at the end of every day and one thing I'd learned from Kent Beck
and reading his book The Extreme programming explained book uh the white Cover Book he said somewhere in there

that are good more some of the bad stuff starts fading away I've even noticed when you do retrospectives if you do it
ever with a smiley face and a frowny face and everybody puts their poits up there eventually you'll get groupings if
